name.label: Memory name
name.tooltip: Name of the current memory consistent with the current MCU datasheet

size.label: Size of the memory
size.tooltip: Size of the current memory consistent with the current MCU datasheet

lowAddress.label: Starting address of this memory
lowAddress.tooltip: Low address of the current memory consistent with the current MCU datasheet

cores.label: CPU access
cores.tooltip: CPU access of the current memory consistent with the current MCU datasheet
